newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle $112/dressed, moderate-USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle $112/dressed, moderate-USDA.

text.p: Compared to last test on Thursday - Slaughter steers and heifers $1.00-$1.50 per cwt higher, USDA said. Trade moderate to active. Demand good. Seller interest moderate to good. Offerings current.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1200-1300 lbs 68.50-70.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1175 lbs clean few70.15 few 975-1000 lbs 67.50.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to last test on Friday - Slaughter steers and heifers mostly 2.00 higher.

Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1175-1300 lbs 111.00-112.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select and Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 105.00-106.00 Holsteins - ( grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1450 lbs ld 107.00 Select 2-3 1250-1450 lbs 103.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs 111.00-112.00.
Wk to Date - 5,800 Week Ago - 8,000 Year Ago - 12,000
